name: ClosedEye
description:
Gameplay

ClosedEye is a top down 2D puzzle game. This game contains puzzles that involve the player’s character facing direction to interact with puzzles in game and include features to close an eye and moving around

The player gets to control the main character while the character’s eye is opened. The player will also have to control the view looking for the character while the character’s eye is closed. The view won’t track the character’s position while the character’s eye is closed.

Controls

Arrow keys:  Move the character

W/A/S/D: Move the view

Z: interact

Z(held): Use item
